oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shelby County Court House with Flag (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Shelby County Court House, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image of courthouse taken from the front corner, with American flag in the background, bushes in bloom in front of the courthouse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: courthouses; law; downtown; government; buildings; Shelby County Courthouse;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: A “Colourpicture” Publication, Cambridge, Mass. Photo by Chamber of Commerce Memphis, Tenn.; Collection processed by Angela Price
